title: 1996 Asian Junior Athletics Championships
text: The 1996 <a href="Asian%20Junior%20Athletics%20Championships">Asian Junior Athletics Championships</a> was the sixth edition of the international <a href="athletics%20%28sport%29">athletics</a> competition for <a href="Asia">Asia</a>n under-20 athletes, organised by the <a href="Asian%20Athletics%20Association">Asian Athletics Association</a>. It took place from 3–6 December in <a href="New%20Delhi">New Delhi</a>, India. It was the second time that the Indian capital had hosted the competition, following the <a href="1992%20Asian%20Junior%20Athletics%20Championships">1992 edition</a>. A total of 41 events were contested, 22 for male athletes and 19 for female athletes.
